atst.giss.abplc

Class PlcioCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • atst.giss.abplc.PlcioCall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlcioCall

    public class PlcioCall
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPlcioCall
    Class providing behavior required to pass PLCIO function call information to the ABPlcioMaster.plcAccess(IPlcioCall) method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface atst.giss.abplc.IPlcioCall

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getArgAddress()
      If this call object represents a call to PLCIO function plc_open() this method will return the address argument passed to the PLCIO function.

      Return the connection name of connection used in call to PLCIO function.
      long getCallTime()
      Get the time the PLCIO function was called.
      IPlcioCall.PlcioMethodName getMethodName()
      Return the PLCIO method name this call object represents.
      long getOpTime()
      The time taken to carry out the PLCIO function call, i.e.
      int getParamConnectionNumber()
      Return the connection channel number of connection used in call to PLCIO function.
      IPlcTag getParamTag()
      Get the IPlcTag to be communicated in this call to PLCIO function.
      long getWaitTime()
      Get the time waited between IPlcioCall.getCallTime() and actual time PLCIO function was called by ABPlcioMaster.
      void setCallTime(long cTime)
      Set this PLCIO call object's time its PLCIO function was called by ABPlcioChannel.
      void setOpTime(long oTime)
      Used by ABPlcioMaster to set the time PLCIO call operation time returned by IPlcioCall.getOpTime().
      void setParamConnectionNumber(int connectionNumber)
      Used by ABPlcioMaster following successful call to PLCIO function plc_open() to set the connection channel number returned.
      void setParamTag(IPlcTag tag)
      Used by ABPlcioMaster following successful call to PLCIO function plc_read() to set GIS PLC tag read.
      void setWaitTime(long wTime)
      Used by ABPlcioMaster to set the time waited by this PLCIO call object to access the synchronized method protecting calls to PLCIO and returned by IPlcioCall.getWaitTime().

      Return a String describing this PlcioCall object.

      • getArgAddress

        public java.lang.String getArgAddress()
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        If this call object represents a call to PLCIO function plc_open() this method will return the address argument passed to the PLCIO function.
        Specified by:
        getArgAddress in interface IPlcioCall
        Returns:
        The address argument passed to PLCIO function plc_open() or null if no address argument supplied in call object's constructor.

      • getArgConnectionName

        public java.lang.String getArgConnectionName()
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        Return the connection name of connection used in call to PLCIO function.

        The GISS names connections to the GIS PLC opened by PLCIO function plc_open() using the GIS PLC tag name the connection will be used to communicate.

        Specified by:
        getArgConnectionName in interface IPlcioCall
        Returns:
        The name of the connection the PLCIO call will use.

      • getParamConnectionNumber

        public int getParamConnectionNumber()
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        Return the connection channel number of connection used in call to PLCIO function.

        A successful call to plc_open() returns a connection number that must be used in all subsequent PLCIO function calls using the open channel.

        Specified by:
        getParamConnectionNumber in interface IPlcioCall
        Returns:
        The number of the connection channel the PLCIO call will use.

      • setParamConnectionNumber

        public void setParamConnectionNumber(int connectionNumber)
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        Used by ABPlcioMaster following successful call to PLCIO function plc_open() to set the connection channel number returned.
        Specified by:
        setParamConnectionNumber in interface IPlcioCall
        Parameters:
        connectionNumber - The connection channel number of the opened PLCIO connection.

      • getParamTag

        public IPlcTag getParamTag()
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        Get the IPlcTag to be communicated in this call to PLCIO function.
        Specified by:
        getParamTag in interface IPlcioCall
        Returns:
        The GIS PLC tag object to be communicated using PLCIO function.

      • setParamTag

        Specified by:
        setParamTag in interface IPlcioCall

      • getWaitTime

        public long getWaitTime()
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        Get the time waited between IPlcioCall.getCallTime() and actual time PLCIO function was called by ABPlcioMaster.

        This method returns the time taken to access the synchronized method used to access the GIS PLC through PLCIO functions.

        Specified by:
        getWaitTime in interface IPlcioCall
        Returns:
        Time waited between call to access PLCIO function and access being granted in ms.

      • setWaitTime

        public void setWaitTime(long wTime)
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        Used by ABPlcioMaster to set the time waited by this PLCIO call object to access the synchronized method protecting calls to PLCIO and returned by IPlcioCall.getWaitTime().
        Specified by:
        setWaitTime in interface IPlcioCall
        Parameters:
        wTime - The time waited in ms.

      • getOpTime

        public long getOpTime()
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        The time taken to carry out the PLCIO function call, i.e. time between PLCIO function being called and it returning.
        Specified by:
        getOpTime in interface IPlcioCall
        Returns:
        Time PLCIO function took to operate in ms.

      • setOpTime

        public void setOpTime(long oTime)
        Description copied from interface: IPlcioCall
        Used by ABPlcioMaster to set the time PLCIO call operation time returned by IPlcioCall.getOpTime().
        Specified by:
        setOpTime in interface IPlcioCall
        Parameters:
        oTime - The time taken for the PLCIO function call to carry out its operation in ms.
